thread.title: North Korea's U.S. prisoners may have been moved

title: North Korea's U.S. prisoners may have been moved
text:
North Korea's U.S. prisoners may have been moved 5:29am EDT - 01:22
The U.S. government is looking into reports that three Americans detained in North Korea have been relocated from a labor camp to a hotel near Pyongyang ahead of a planned summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un, a U.S. official said on Wednesday.
The U.S. government is looking into reports that three Americans detained in North Korea have been relocated from a labor camp to a hotel near Pyongyang ahead of a planned summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un, a U.S. official said on Wednesday. //reut.rs/2Kwe8NO
